column2: The person that this title is bestowed upon is considered to be the Champion of the Realm. There is surely no greater honor for mortal men to aspire to.
column3: La personne à qui ce titre est décerné est considérée comme le champion du royaume. Aucun mortel ne saurait espérer titre plus honorable.
column4: Die Person, die diesen Titel erhalten hat, wird als Champion des Reiches angesehen. Es gibt wahrlich keine größere Ehre für Sterbliche.
column6: La persona a la que se le otorga este título es considerada como el Campeón del Reino. No se puede aspirar a un honor mayor para los hombres mortales.

column2: became lost in the desert, and never returned
In a paganified world, Crusades can only be called if a player is Christian.
In a paganified world, Jihads can only be called if a player is Muslim.
how friendly the emperor is to outsiders.
You lose a great deal of weight.
You gain a great deal of weight.
You're weight gets a little healthier.
You're weight gets a lot healthier.
It seems you've got an ancrel_oilworks, why don't I take that off your hands for the fair sum of 200g? I won't take no for an answer!
This character is too afraid of persecution to join.
Your courtier, [From.GetBestName], has requested your leave to join the [holy_order.GetName] and fight for [From.GetReligionAdherent]s.

Greetings [Root.GetTitledFirstName], I hope this meets you well. I have learned of an excellent location to build a new fortress for the [holy_order.GetName] in [From.GetName]. We would of course compensate you for the land.\n\nWhat say you?
I will do no such thing!
The construction of [holy_order.GetName] new fortress in [GetName] is completed!
The [From.GetTitle] have been expelled from your realm!
The [From.GetTitle] have received your generous donation!

Greetings [Root.GetTitledFirstName], \nThe [holy_order.GetName] is willing to... forget, your outstanding debts. But you must send your [FromFrom.GetSonDaughter] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] to us to join our cause.
I don't take demands from you!
Your loan from the [holy_order.GetName] has been approved!
[From.GetFullName], [holy_order.GetRulerTitle] of the [holy_order.GetName], has recognized you as [From.GetHerHis] liege!
[borrower.GetTitledFirstName], \n\nIn lieu of payment for your outstanding debt, we insist you grant us leave to construct a fortress in your lands.
I suppose I have no choice...
I have your money, now go!
A fortress has been constructed in [Root.GetName] by the [holy_order.GetName].
These bottles of otherwise acceptable wine have been dosed with a common poison.
This wine is weak, both in flavor and alcohol. It is good for cooking and desperate drunks.
These bottles contain average wine. It won't offend anyone, but it won't impress either.
This wine is of a good quality, something all but the most particular pallete would enjoy.
This batch of wine is of surpassing quality, very few ever experience the pleasure of drinking a wine like this.
These bottles are the pinnacle of wine-making. Skill alone could not produce such a draught, only divine intervention could provide the necessary circumstances.
These bottles of otherwise acceptable wine have been infused with deadly poison.
